page.title: 11Pollution in Viewpark
page.content: In our area the worst form of pollution is litter. It is everywhere, in the parks,pavements,etc. Our local 'Glen' was once a beautiful place with its trees,water and walks, but a lot of rubbish was dumped there, even things like old cars and washing mach- ines. There are people working to clean this up, as well as all the broken glass and cans which can hurt wildlife. Some of our pupils went out to clean up around the school, but it only stayed clear for a while then it was as bad as ever. Although the river and stream in the 'Glen' are also polluted from factories and with rubbish, the air is not too bad. We have no smoky factor- ies. Litter is still the worst problem.
